about_the_game:
[Source Code]

[Source Code] is an ultra-realistic shooting and strategic construction game meticulously crafted by the top-tier game development team, Blitzball. It seamlessly blends the intense combat experience of Call of Duty with the tactical depth of Counter-Strike 2. In this game, you will step into a lifelike battlefield meticulously sculpted by cutting-edge graphics rendering technology and physics engines, experiencing unparalleled immersion in combat and creation.

Ultra-Realistic Battlefield, Ultimate Visual Feast

The game adopts the most advanced graphics technology, presenting stunning visual effects. From the neon nightscape of bustling cities to the scorching sun of desolate deserts, every scene is meticulously designed to ensure you can feel the swaying of every leaf and the flying of every grain of sand. The realistic lighting effects and intricate environmental details make you feel like you are in a real battlefield.

Portal System, Infinite Tactical Possibilities

A significant innovation in [Source Code] is its unique portal system. Players can quickly deploy portals on the battlefield for instantaneous transfer, whether for a rapid raid into enemy territory or an emergency evacuation from dangerous areas. The flexible use of portals will revolutionize traditional combat strategies, making every move you make full of uncertainty.

Build Fortifications, Strategic Defense and Counterattack

Beyond intense shooting battles, the game also incorporates rich construction elements. Players can utilize available resources to rapidly build fortifications, shelters, and other defensive facilities on the battlefield, constructing their own combat strongholds. Whether it's a sturdy bunker or a complex labyrinthine defensive structure, they can provide robust support for your combat. While defending, you can also use the fortifications as a starting point for counterattacks, planning thrilling counter-offensive battles.

AK Series Firearms, Glorious Tradition

AK series firearms are renowned for their durability and precision. In [Source Code], players can freely choose and combine various AK series firearms, ranging from rifles to machine guns, each with its unique performance and purpose. Whether for close-range rapid shooting or long-range precise strikes, AK series firearms can meet your combat needs. Besides AK series firearms, the game also offers a wide variety of other modern weapons and equipment, from advanced tactical skills to various grenades and explosives. Players can freely mix and match based on their preferences and combat requirements. Diverse weapon and equipment combinations not only personalize your combat style but also maximize tactical effectiveness in battle.

Team Collaboration, Shared Glory

[Source Code] supports multiplayer online and LAN gameplay, allowing you to team up with friends to face powerful enemies together. In a team, you need to closely cooperate with teammates, formulate tactics, utilize portal and fortification systems, and jointly resist enemy attacks to secure victory in combat. Every successful collaboration will deepen the rapport and friendship among you.

Global Online Competition, Pushing Limits

The game features a global online competition system where you can compete against players from around the world. In tense and exciting matches, showcase your tactical wisdom and shooting skills, climbing to the pinnacle of honor. Every victory will add brilliance to your legendary journey.

High-Difficulty Intelligent AI, Infinite Challenges

The game introduces a high-difficulty intelligent AI system. These AI enemies will make real-time judgments and reactions based on player behavior. They will use terrain for cover, flexibly choose shooting positions, and even cooperate with companions to charge, maximizing the threat to players' survival. The inclusion of high-difficulty intelligent AI makes every battle full of unknowns and challenges, requiring players to remain vigilant at all times and use tactics and wisdom to respond to various situations.

New and Complete Zombie DLC, Pushing Survival Limits

The game specially introduces a Zombie DLC, taking players into a world of even greater horror and despair. In post-war North America and Europe, a massive viral infection has led to a zombie infestation. Players need to survive in this dangerous environment, facing not only the threat of zombies but also competing with other players for limited resources. The Zombie Infinite DLC not only adds more challenges and fun to the game but also lets players experience the struggle between survival and death in tense and exciting battles.

Unreal Engine 5, Cinematic Graphics

[Source Code] utilizes Unreal Engine 5 for rendering, bringing players an unprecedented visual experience. Every scene and detail in the game has been meticulously designed and optimized, achieving realistic, cinematic effects. Whether it's a battlefield filled with gunfire and smoke, ruined urban ruins, or high-tech weapons and equipment, they are all rendered lifelike, as if you are in a real modern battlefield. The extreme rendering capabilities of Unreal Engine 5 allow players to not only feel the shock of gunfire but also enjoy a cinematic visual feast during combat.

Join [Source Code], Embark on Your Legendary Journey

As an ultra-realistic game combining shooting, team tactics, and construction, [Source Code] not only brings you an extreme visual feast and combat experience but also lets you feel the collision of strategy and wisdom in every game. We invite you to join this global combat feast, exploring the unknown, pushing limits, and jointly writing your legendary chapter with us! Join [Source Code] now and start your adventure!

name: Source Code

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX-1080Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: Support UEVR
  • Additional Notes: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-12400
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX-3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Dolby Atoms
  • VR Support: Support UEVR
  • Additional Notes: N/A

short_description: "Source Code" is a large-scale multiplayer online and LAN FPS/TPS game set in the backdrop of World War III. It features building and portal systems, a comprehensive Zombie DLC, and a wide array of firearms and equipment for competitive shooting.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean, Uzbek, Urdu, Armenian, Igbo, Sindhi, Sinhala, Croatian, Icelandic, Cherokee, Galician, Catalan, Afrikaans, Kannada, Luxembourgish, Hindi, Gujarati, Kyrgyz, Kazakh, Turkmen, K'iche', Kinyarwanda, Tajik, Serbian, Odia, Welsh, Konkani, Bangla, Nepali, Basque, Hebrew, Latvian, Tigrinya, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Georgian, Maori, Wolof, Bosnian, Persian, Telugu, Tamil, Irish, Estonian, Valencian, Belarusian, Quechua, Zulu, Xhosa, Lithuanian, Sotho, Sorani, Yoruba, Uyghur, Scots, Tswana, Filipino, Mongolian, Hausa, Dari, Azerbaijani, Amharic, Albanian, Assamese, Tatar, Macedonian, Marathi, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Khmer
